body_content.explanation: not part of or suitable for the time when students are being taught together:
examples: The students were working on a non-class project.
Teachers do not have to stay in the school buildings during nonclass time.

body_content.explanation: not based on the economic and social position that people have:
examples: We need a non-class political party to unite all sections of society.
There is no such thing as a nonclass language that all the people speak.

body_content.explanation: not part of a class action (= a case that is organized by a group of people who all have the same legal problem):
examples: The individual non-class plaintiffs will now automatically become part of the class action.
There are different rules for class and nonclass lawsuits.
